text: Kidnapped is a book by Robert Louis Stevenson. It was published in 1886. It tells the story of the 18th-century "Appin Murder" following the Jacobite Rising. Some of the characters in the book were based on real people. The book has been adapted to movies many times and to comic books. ==Related pages== * Kidnapped (movie) ==References== Category:1886 books Category:Books by Robert Louis Stevenson Category:British novels
title: Kidnapped (novel)
